ddl:
CREATE TABLE public.configs (
  "config_id" integer NOT NULL,
  "file_name" text NULL,
  "last_treatment" text NULL,
  "ftp" text NULL,
  "ftp_ip" text NULL,
  "ftp_user" text NULL,
  "ftp_password" text NULL,
  "ftp_directory" text NULL,
  "payload" text NULL,
  "gateway_id" integer NULL,
  "parsing_id" integer NULL,
  "file_id" integer NULL,
  "to_move" text NULL,
  "regex_variables" text NULL,
  "created_at" text NULL,
  "updated_at" text NULL,
  "active" boolean NULL,
  "error_message" text NULL,
  "last_modified" text NULL,
  "keep_folder" boolean NULL
);

CREATE TABLE public.gateways (
  "gateway_id" integer NOT NULL,
  "name" text NULL,
  "serial_number" text NULL,
  "transfer_protocol" text NULL,
  "power_supply" text NULL,
  "installation_date" text NULL,
  "operating_team" text NULL,
  "x" double precision NULL,
  "y" double precision NULL,
  "z" double precision NULL,
  "time_zone" text NULL,
  "geom" text NULL,
  "created_at" text NULL,
  "updated_at" text NULL,
  "provider" integer NULL
);

CREATE TABLE public.projects (
  "project_id" integer NOT NULL,
  "name" text NULL,
  "country" text NULL,
  "client_company_name" text NULL,
  "time_zone" text NULL,
  "city" text NULL,
  "start_date" text NULL,
  "description" text NULL
);

CREATE TABLE public.raw_measurements (
  "gateway_name" text NULL,
  "variable_name" text NULL,
  "variable_alias" text NULL,
  "sensor_id" integer NULL,
  "value" double precision NULL,
  "timestamp" text NULL,
  "variable_id" integer NULL,
  "unit" text NULL,
  "metric" text NULL
);

CREATE TABLE public.sites (
  "site_id" integer NOT NULL,
  "name" text NULL,
  "type" text NULL,
  "extent" text NULL,
  "start_date" text NULL,
  "previsional_end" text NULL,
  "project_id" integer NULL,
  "created_at" text NULL,
  "updated_at" text NULL,
  "deleted" boolean NULL,
  "operating_rate" double precision NULL,
  "main_site" integer NULL
);
